carbon_emissions.description: Validates that reported direct carbon emissions remain within the defined organizational threshold.
carbon_emissions.reference: GHG Protocol Corporate Standard Ch.4; ISO 14064-1:2018 7.4.3

renewable_energy_ratio.description: Ensures that a minimum share of total energy use comes from renewable sources.
renewable_energy_ratio.reference: GHG Protocol Scope 2 Guidance Sec.6.2; ISO 14064-1:2018 7.4.3

water_usage_efficiency.description: Confirms that water is used efficiently, ensuring processes consume no more than set thresholds.
water_usage_efficiency.reference: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018; ISO 14046 Water Footprint

waste_recycling_rate.description: Checks that a minimum portion of waste generated is being recycled or recovered.
waste_recycling_rate.reference: GRI 306: Waste 2020; EU Waste Framework Directive

biodiversity_protection.description: Ensures that biodiversity protection practices are reported and in place.

ghg_scope3_reporting.description: Confirms whether indirect Scope 3 emissions are disclosed in accordance with recognized standards.

hazardous_waste_disclosure.description: Ensures hazardous waste management is disclosed transparently as 'disclosed' or 'not_disclosed'.

energy_efficiency_index.description: Verifies overall energy efficiency performance meets organizational targets.

environmental_fines.description: Validates that no environmental fines have been incurred during the reporting period.

climate_risk_assessment.description: Ensures the organization performs a climate risk assessment in line with global frameworks.

scope1_emissions.description: Ensures that Scope 1 (direct) emissions are comprehensively reported and included in the inventory.
scope1_emissions.reference: GHG Protocol Corporate Standard Ch.4.2; ISO 14064-1:2018 7.3.2; IPCC 2006 Vol.1 Ch.2

NaN.description: Validates disclosure across all 15 Scope 3 categories when applicable.

scope2_emissions.description: Ensures Scope 2 (indirect energy) emissions are disclosed in compliance with GHG Protocol.
scope2_emissions.reference: GHG Protocol Scope 2 Guidance Sec.2.2; ISO 14064-1:2018 7.3.3

scope3_emissions.description: Ensures Scope 3 (value chain) emissions are disclosed when material and relevant.
scope3_emissions.reference: GHG Protocol Scope 3 Standard Ch.4; ISO 14064-1:2018 7.3.4

emission_factors_documented.description: Ensures that emission factors used for calculations are disclosed and documented.

units_consistency.description: Checks that units of measurement are consistent across all reported emissions.

reporting_period_consistency.description: Ensures emissions reporting period matches the organization’s financial or operational cycle.

employee_diversity_ratio.description: Ensures at least 30% diversity across the workforce (gender, ethnicity, or other protected classes).
employee_diversity_ratio.reference: GRI 405: Diversity and Equal Opportunity; ISO 26000 Sec.6.3.7

pay_equity_gap.description: Validates that the gender pay gap does not exceed 10% across equivalent roles.
pay_equity_gap.reference: GRI 405-2 Ratio of basic salary; ILO Equal Remuneration Convention C100

health_safety_incidents.description: Ensures that workplace incidents remain within safety thresholds.
health_safety_incidents.reference: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety; ISO 45001

employee_training_hours.description: Validates employees receive a minimum of 20 hours of professional development annually.

turnover_rate.description: Ensures voluntary employee turnover does not exceed 15% annually.

whistleblower_policy.description: Confirms presence of a whistleblower protection mechanism.
whistleblower_policy.reference: GRI 102-17 Mechanisms for advice and concerns

community_investment.description: Ensures a minimum level of financial investment in community programs.

data_privacy_incidents.description: Validates that no data privacy breaches have occurred in the reporting period.

human_rights_policy.description: Confirms presence of a formal human rights policy aligned with UN Guiding Principles.
human_rights_policy.reference: GRI 412: Human Rights Assessment; ISO 26000 Sec.6.3

board_independence_ratio.description: Ensures that at least 50% of board members are independent.
board_independence_ratio.reference: OECD Principles of Corporate Governance; GRI 102-22

executive_compensation_linked_esg.description: Confirms that executive pay structures are linked to ESG performance metrics.

anti_corruption_policy.description: Ensures that a zero-tolerance anti-corruption policy exists.

shareholder_rights_protection.description: Confirms measures to protect shareholder voting and information rights.
shareholder_rights_protection.reference: OECD Principles of Corporate Governance Sec.III

audit_committee_independence.description: Ensures audit committees have majority independent directors.

tax_transparency.description: Validates disclosure of country-by-country tax payments.

political_contributions_disclosure.description: Ensures that political contributions are disclosed transparently.

cybersecurity_governance.description: Confirms that governance structures exist for cybersecurity oversight.

risk_management_framework.description: Validates existence of an enterprise risk management framework.

stakeholder_engagement.description: Ensures structured engagement with stakeholders on ESG issues.
